channel.description: Announcements, examples, and updates for the LowLevelFEM Julia package

item.title: November 2025 â€“ Package Announcement
item.description:
We are happy to announce that **LowLevelFEM.jl** is now officially available in the Julia General Registry! ðŸŽ‰ The package provides a lightweight and transparent FEM environment written entirely in Julia. It supports: - 2D and 3D solid mechanics (plane stress/strain, axisymmetric, and full 3D) - Heat conduction and thermo-mechanical coupling - Gmsh integration for pre- and post-processing Unlike symbolic DSL-based FEM frameworks, LowLevelFEM gives you full control over assembly, boundary conditions, and solution steps â€” ideal for teaching, research, and method development. ðŸ“š [Documentation](https://perebalazs.github.io/LowLevelFEM.jl/stable/) ðŸ—£ [Original announcement on Julia Discourse](https://discourse.julialang.org/t/ann-lowlevelfem-jl-a-lightweight-fem-toolbox-in-julia/) Stay tuned for upcoming examples and performance notes in future posts!

Read more...
